wch,wchp = [],[]
for j in range(len(df)):
    total = df['Wrinkle'][j]+df['Cracked'][j]+df['Hole'][j]
    total_p = total/df['Production'][j]
    wch.append(total)
    wchp.append(total_p)
source.b27794e9:
wp,cp,hp = [],[],[]
def ps(col,lis):
    for i in range (len(df)):
        p = df[col][i]/df['Production'][i]
        lis.append(p)
    return p
ps('Wrinkle',wp)
ps('Cracked',cp)
ps('Hole',hp)

n = sum(df['Production'])
np = sum(df['Wrinkle'])+sum(df['Cracked'])+sum(df['Hole'])
source.2a3f8975:
cl,ucl,lcl = [],[],[]
for k in range(len(df)):
    fcl = np/n
    fucl = fcl+3*((fcl*(1-fcl))/len(df))**(1/2)
    flcl = fcl-3*((fcl*(1-fcl))/len(df))**(1/2)
    if flcl < 0:
        flcl = 0
    cl.append(fcl)
    ucl.append(fucl)
    lcl.append(flcl)
